Plot: When their latest work is buffed by a rival crew, two determined graffiti writers embark on an elaborate plan to bomb the ultimate location: the New York Mets' Home Run Apple.
Title: Gimme the Loot
Actors: Tashiana Washington, Ty Hickson, Meeko, Sam Soghor
tomatoConsensus: Thanks to energetic performances from its young leads, Gimme The Loot captures a slice of city life with warmth and exuberance.
